segments.source_content: # i18n - Using Crowdin

translations.zh-hant: # 國際化 - 使用 Crowdin

segments.source_content: The i18n system of Docusaurus is **decoupled from any translation software**.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 的國際化系統**與任何翻譯軟體解耦**。

segments.source_content: You can integrate Docusaurus with the **tools and SaaS of your choice**, as long as you put the **translation files at the correct location**.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以將 Docusaurus 與**您選擇的工具和 SaaS 整合**，只要將**翻譯文件放在正確的位置**即可。

segments.source_content: We document the usage of [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/), as **one** possible **integration example**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們以 [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) 的使用為例，作為**一種**可能的**整合範例**。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This is **not an endorsement of Crowdin** as the unique choice to translate a Docusaurus site, but it is successfully used by Facebook to translate documentation projects such as [Jest](https://jestjs.io/), [Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/), and [ReasonML](https://reasonml.github.io/).

Refer to the **[Crowdin documentation](https://support.crowdin.com/)** and **[Crowdin support](mailto:support@crowdin.com)** for help.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

這**並非對 Crowdin 作為唯一翻譯 Docusaurus 網站的選擇的背書**，但它已被 Facebook 成功用於翻譯如 [Jest](https://jestjs.io/)、[Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/) 和 [ReasonML](https://reasonml.github.io/) 等文件專案。

如需協助，請參考 **[Crowdin 文件](https://support.crowdin.com/)** 和 **[Crowdin 支援](mailto:support@crowdin.com)**。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use this **[community-driven GitHub discussion](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/4052)** to discuss anything related to Docusaurus + Crowdin.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用這個 **[社群驅動的 GitHub 討論](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/discussions/4052)** 來討論任何與 Docusaurus + Crowdin 相關的事項。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Crowdin overview {#crowdin-overview}

translations.zh-hant: ## Crowdin 概覽 {#crowdin-overview}

segments.source_content: Crowdin is a translation SaaS, offering a [free plan for open-source projects](https://crowdin.com/page/open-source-project-setup-request).

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 是一個翻譯 SaaS，提供 [開放原始碼專案的免費方案](https://crowdin.com/page/open-source-project-setup-request)。

segments.source_content: We recommend the following translation workflow:

translations.zh-hant: 我們推薦以下翻譯工作流程：

segments.source_content:
- **Upload sources** to Crowdin (untranslated files)
- Use Crowdin to **translate the content**
- **Download translations** from Crowdin (localized translation files)

translations.zh-hant:
- **上傳來源文件**至 Crowdin（未翻譯的文件）
- 使用 Crowdin **翻譯內容**
- **下載翻譯**自 Crowdin（本地化的翻譯文件）

segments.source_content: Crowdin provides a [CLI](https://support.crowdin.com/cli-tool/) to **upload sources** and **download translations**, allowing you to automate the translation process.

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 提供一個 [CLI](https://support.crowdin.com/cli-tool/) 來**上傳來源文件**和**下載翻譯**，讓您能自動化翻譯流程。

segments.source_content: The [`crowdin.yml` configuration file](https://support.crowdin.com/configuration-file/) is convenient for Docusaurus, and permits to **download the localized translation files at the expected location** (in `i18n/[locale]/..`).

translations.zh-hant: [`crowdin.yml` 設定檔](https://support.crowdin.com/configuration-file/) 對 Docusaurus 來說很方便，並允許**將本地化的翻譯文件下載到預期的位置**（在 `i18n/[locale]/..` 中）。

segments.source_content: Read the **[official documentation](https://support.crowdin.com/)** to know more about advanced features and different translation workflows.

translations.zh-hant: 閱讀 **[官方文件](https://support.crowdin.com/)** 以了解更多進階功能和不同的翻譯工作流程。

segments.source_content: ## Crowdin tutorial {#crowdin-tutorial}

translations.zh-hant: ## Crowdin 教學 {#crowdin-tutorial}

segments.source_content: This is a walk-through of using Crowdin to translate a newly initialized English Docusaurus website into French, and assume you already followed the [i18n tutorial](./i18n-tutorial.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 這是一個使用 Crowdin 將新初始化的英文 Docusaurus 網站翻譯成法文的逐步指南，並假設您已遵循 [國際化教學](./i18n-tutorial.mdx)。

segments.source_content: The end result can be seen at [docusaurus-crowdin-example.netlify.app](https://docusaurus-crowdin-example.netlify.app/) ([repository](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-crowdin-example)).

translations.zh-hant: 最終結果可以在 [docusaurus-crowdin-example.netlify.app](https://docusaurus-crowdin-example.netlify.app/) 查看（[儲存庫](https://github.com/slorber/docusaurus-crowdin-example)）。

segments.source_content: ### Create a Crowdin project {#create-a-crowdin-project}

translations.zh-hant: ### 建立 Crowdin 專案 {#create-a-crowdin-project}

segments.source_content: Sign up on [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/), and create a project.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) 上註冊，並建立一個專案。

segments.source_content: Use English as the source language, and French as the target language.

translations.zh-hant: 使用英文作為來源語言，法文作為目標語言。

segments.source_content: ![Create a Crowdin project with english as source language, and french as target language](/img/crowdin/crowdin-create-project.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![建立一個 Crowdin 專案，以英文為來源語言，法文為目標語言](/img/crowdin/crowdin-create-project.png)

segments.source_content: Your project is created, but it is empty for now. We will upload the files to translate in the next steps.

translations.zh-hant: 您的專案已建立，但目前是空的。我們將在接下來的步驟中上傳要翻譯的文件。

segments.source_content: ### Create the Crowdin configuration {#create-the-crowdin-configuration}

translations.zh-hant: ### 建立 Crowdin 設定 {#create-the-crowdin-configuration}

segments.source_content: This configuration ([doc](https://support.crowdin.com/configuration-file/)) provides a mapping for the Crowdin CLI to understand:

translations.zh-hant: 此設定（[文件](https://support.crowdin.com/configuration-file/)）提供了一個映射，讓 Crowdin CLI 能夠理解：

segments.source_content:
- Where to find the source files to upload (JSON and Markdown)
- Where to download the files after translation (in `i18n/[locale]`)

translations.zh-hant:
- 上傳來源檔案的位置（JSON 和 Markdown）
- 翻譯後下載檔案的位置（位於 `i18n/[locale]` 目錄下）

segments.source_content: Create `crowdin.yml` in `website`:

translations.zh-hant: 在 `website` 目錄下建立 `crowdin.yml`：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="crowdin.yml"
project_id: '123456'
api_token_env: CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN
preserve_hierarchy: true
files:
  # JSON translation files
  - source: /i18n/en/**/*
    translation: /i18n/%two_letters_code%/**/%original_file_name%
  # Docs Markdown files
  - source: /docs/**/*
    translation: /i18n/%two_letters_code%/docusaurus-plugin-content-docs/current/**/%original_file_name%
  # Blog Markdown files
  - source: /blog/**/*
    translation: /i18n/%two_letters_code%/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/**/%original_file_name%
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b27056c4

segments.source_content: Crowdin has its own syntax for declaring source/translation paths:

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 有自己宣告來源/翻譯路徑的語法：

segments.source_content:
- `**/*`: everything in a subfolder
- `%two_letters_code%`: the 2-letters variant of Crowdin target languages (`fr` in our case)
- `**/%original_file_name%`: the translations will preserve the original folder/file hierarchy

translations.zh-hant:
- `**/*`：子資料夾中的所有內容
- `%two_letters_code%`：Crowdin 目標語言的兩位字母代碼（本例中為 `fr`）
- `**/%original_file_name%`：翻譯將保留原始資料夾/檔案層級結構

segments.source_content:
:::info

The Crowdin CLI warnings are not always easy to understand.

We advise to:

- change one thing at a time
- re-upload sources after any configuration change
- use paths starting with `/` (`./` does not work)
- avoid fancy globbing patterns like `/docs/**/*.(md|mdx)` (does not work)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

Crowdin CLI 的警告訊息有時不易理解。

建議您：

- 一次只修改一項設定
- 任何配置變更後重新上傳來源檔案
- 使用以 `/` 開頭的路徑（`./` 無效）
- 避免使用複雜的 glob 模式如 `/docs/**/*.(md|mdx)`（無效）

:::

segments.source_content: #### Access token {#access-token}

translations.zh-hant: #### 存取權杖 {#access-token}

segments.source_content: The `api_token_env` attribute defines the **env variable name** read by the Crowdin CLI.

translations.zh-hant: `api_token_env` 屬性定義了 Crowdin CLI 讀取的**環境變數名稱**。

segments.source_content: You can obtain a `Personal Access Token` on [your personal profile page](https://crowdin.com/settings#api-key).

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在[個人資料頁面](https://crowdin.com/settings#api-key)取得 `Personal Access Token`。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

You can keep the default value `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN`, and set this environment variable and on your computer and on the CI server to the generated access token.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

您可以保留預設值 `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN`，並在本地電腦和 CI 伺服器上將此環境變數設為產生的存取權杖。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

A Personal Access Tokens grant **read-write access to all your Crowdin projects**.

You should **not commit** it, and it may be a good idea to create a dedicated **Crowdin profile for your company** instead of using a personal account.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

個人存取權杖會授予**對所有 Crowdin 專案的讀寫權限**。

您**不應提交**此權杖，建議為公司建立專用的**Crowdin 帳號**而非使用個人帳戶。

:::

segments.source_content: #### Other configuration fields {#other-configuration-fields}

translations.zh-hant: #### 其他配置欄位 {#other-configuration-fields}

segments.source_content:
- `project_id`: can be hardcoded, and is found on `https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>/settings#api`
- `preserve_hierarchy`: preserve the folder's hierarchy of your docs on Crowdin UI instead of flattening everything

translations.zh-hant:
- `project_id`：可硬編碼，位於 `https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>/settings#api`
- `preserve_hierarchy`：在 Crowdin 介面中保留文件夾層級結構而非扁平化顯示

segments.source_content: ### Install the Crowdin CLI {#install-the-crowdin-cli}

translations.zh-hant: ### 安裝 Crowdin CLI {#install-the-crowdin-cli}

segments.source_content: This tutorial uses the CLI version `3.5.2`, but we expect `3.x` releases to keep working.

translations.zh-hant: 本教學使用 CLI 版本 `3.5.2`，但預期 `3.x` 系列版本均可正常運作。

segments.source_content: Install the Crowdin CLI as an npm package to your Docusaurus site:

translations.zh-hant: 將 Crowdin CLI 作為 npm 套件安裝至 Docusaurus 專案：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install @crowdin/cli@3
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f02969e0

segments.source_content: Add a `crowdin` script:

translations.zh-hant: 新增 `crowdin` 指令：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_21f43a9a

segments.source_content: Test that you can run the Crowdin CLI:

translations.zh-hant: 測試是否能執行 Crowdin CLI：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run crowdin -- --version
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cf50de8a

segments.source_content: Set the `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN` env variable on your computer, to allow the CLI to authenticate with the Crowdin API.

translations.zh-hant: 在電腦上設定 `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN` 環境變數，讓 CLI 能通過 Crowdin API 驗證。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Temporarily, you can hardcode your personal token in `crowdin.yml` with `api_token: 'MY-TOKEN'`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

臨時解決方案：可在 `crowdin.yml` 中硬編碼個人權杖 `api_token: 'MY-TOKEN'`。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Upload the sources {#upload-the-sources}

translations.zh-hant: ### 上傳來源檔案 {#upload-the-sources}

segments.source_content: Generate the JSON translation files for the default language in `website/i18n/en`:

translations.zh-hant: 在 `website/i18n/en` 目錄下產生預設語言的 JSON 翻譯檔案：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run write-translations
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_daad2e28

segments.source_content: Upload all the JSON and Markdown translation files:

translations.zh-hant: 上傳所有 JSON 和 Markdown 翻譯檔案：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run crowdin upload
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_18e3e63d

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin CLI uploading Docusaurus source files](/img/crowdin/crowdin-upload-sources-cli.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin CLI 上傳 Docusaurus 來源檔案](/img/crowdin/crowdin-upload-sources-cli.png)

segments.source_content: Your source files are now visible on the Crowdin interface: `https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>/settings#files`

translations.zh-hant: 來源檔案現可於 Crowdin 介面查看：`https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>/settings#files`

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin UI showing Docusaurus source files](/img/crowdin/crowdin-source-files.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin 介面顯示 Docusaurus 來源檔案](/img/crowdin/crowdin-source-files.png)

segments.source_content: ### Translate the sources {#translate-the-sources}

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯來源檔案 {#translate-the-sources}

segments.source_content: On `https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>`, click on the French target language.

translations.zh-hant: 在 `https://crowdin.com/project/<MY_PROJECT_NAME>` 頁面，點選法語目標語言。

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin UI showing French translation files](/img/crowdin/crowdin-french-translations.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin 介面顯示法文翻譯檔案](/img/crowdin/crowdin-french-translations.png)

segments.source_content: Translate some Markdown files.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯部分 Markdown 檔案。

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin UI to translate a Markdown file](/img/crowdin/crowdin-translate-markdown.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin 介面翻譯 Markdown 檔案](/img/crowdin/crowdin-translate-markdown.png)

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use `Hide String` to make sure translators **don't translate things that should not be**:

- Front matter: `id`, `slug`, `tags` ...
- Admonitions: `:::`, `:::note`, `:::tip` ...

![Crowdin UI hide string](/img/crowdin/crowdin-hide-string.png)

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

使用 `隱藏字串` 功能確保翻譯人員**不會翻譯不該翻譯的內容**：

- Front matter：`id`、`slug`、`tags`...
- 提示框語法：`:::`、`:::note`、`:::tip`...

![Crowdin 介面隱藏字串功能](/img/crowdin/crowdin-hide-string.png)

:::

segments.source_content: Translate some JSON files.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯部分 JSON 檔案。

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin UI to translate a JSON file](/img/crowdin/crowdin-translate-json.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin 介面翻譯 JSON 檔案](/img/crowdin/crowdin-translate-json.png)

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `description` attribute of JSON translation files is visible on Crowdin to help translate the strings.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

JSON 翻譯檔案中的 `description` 屬性會在 Crowdin 上顯示，協助翻譯字串。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

**[Pre-translate](https://support.crowdin.com/pre-translation-via-machine/)** your site, and **fix pre-translation mistakes manually** (enable the Global Translation Memory in settings first).

Use the `Hide String` feature first, as Crowdin is pre-translating things too optimistically.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

先使用**[預先翻譯](https://support.crowdin.com/pre-translation-via-machine/)**功能處理網站內容，再**手動修正預先翻譯的錯誤**（請先於設定中啟用全域翻譯記憶庫）。

建議先使用 `隱藏字串` 功能，因為 Crowdin 的預先翻譯機制有時會過度樂觀地處理內容。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Download the translations {#download-the-translations}

translations.zh-hant: ### 下載翻譯內容 {#download-the-translations}

segments.source_content: Use the Crowdin CLI to download the translated JSON and Markdown files.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 Crowdin CLI 下載已翻譯的 JSON 與 Markdown 檔案。

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run crowdin download
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_79d8cec2

segments.source_content: The translated content should be downloaded in `i18n/fr`.

translations.zh-hant: 翻譯後的內容應會下載至 `i18n/fr` 目錄。

segments.source_content: Start your site on the French locale:

translations.zh-hant: 以法語系啟動網站：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run start -- --locale fr
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_eb13dcb2

segments.source_content: Make sure that your website is now translated in French at [`http://localhost:3000/fr/`](http://localhost:3000/fr/).

translations.zh-hant: 確認網站現已於 [`http://localhost:3000/fr/`](http://localhost:3000/fr/) 顯示法文翻譯版本。

segments.source_content: ### Automate with CI {#automate-with-ci}

translations.zh-hant: ### 透過 CI 自動化流程 {#automate-with-ci}

segments.source_content: We will configure the CI to **download the Crowdin translations at build time** and keep them outside of Git.

translations.zh-hant: 我們將設定 CI 在建置時**從 Crowdin 下載翻譯內容**，並將其保留在 Git 版本控制之外。

segments.source_content: Add `website/i18n` to `.gitignore`.

translations.zh-hant: 將 `website/i18n` 加入 `.gitignore`。

segments.source_content: Set the `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN` env variable on your CI.

translations.zh-hant: 在 CI 環境中設定 `CROWDIN_PERSONAL_TOKEN` 環境變數。

segments.source_content: Create an npm script to `sync` Crowdin (extract sources, upload sources, download translations):

translations.zh-hant: 建立 npm 指令來 `同步` Crowdin 內容（提取來源檔案、上傳來源檔案、下載翻譯檔案）：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ac2ed4ad

segments.source_content: Call the `npm run crowdin:sync` script in your CI, just before building the Docusaurus site.

translations.zh-hant: 於 CI 流程中呼叫 `npm run crowdin:sync` 指令，緊接在建置 Docusaurus 網站之前執行。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Keep your deploy-previews fast: don't download translations, and use `npm run build -- --locale en` for feature branches.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

保持部署預覽速度：不需下載翻譯內容，針對功能分支使用 `npm run build -- --locale en` 指令。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Crowdin does not support well multiple concurrent uploads/downloads: it is preferable to only include translations to your production deployment, and keep deploy previews untranslated.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

Crowdin 對多重併發上傳/下載支援不佳：建議僅在正式部署時包含翻譯內容，保持部署預覽版本未翻譯狀態。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Advanced Crowdin topics {#advanced-crowdin-topics}

translations.zh-hant: ## Crowdin 進階主題 {#advanced-crowdin-topics}

segments.source_content: ### MDX {#mdx}

translations.zh-hant: ### MDX 格式 {#mdx}

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Pay special attention to the JSX fragments in MDX documents!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

請特別注意 MDX 文件中的 JSX 片段！

:::

segments.source_content: Crowdin **does not support officially MDX**, but they added **support for the `.mdx` extension**, and interpret such files as Markdown (instead of plain text).

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin **官方並不支援 MDX**，但已新增**對 `.mdx` 副檔名的支援**，會將此類檔案視為 Markdown 格式（而非純文字）。

segments.source_content: #### MDX problems {#mdx-problems}

translations.zh-hant: #### MDX 問題 {#mdx-problems}

segments.source_content: Crowdin thinks that the JSX syntax is embedded HTML and can mess up with the JSX markup when you download the translations, leading to a site that fails to build due to invalid JSX.

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 會將 JSX 語法誤判為嵌入式 HTML，可能在下載翻譯時破壞 JSX 標記結構，導致網站因無效 JSX 而建置失敗。

segments.source_content: Simple JSX fragments using simple string props like `<Username name="Sebastien"/>` will work fine; more complex JSX fragments using object/array props like `<User person={{name: "Sebastien"}}/>` are more likely to fail due to a syntax that does not look like HTML.

translations.zh-hant: 使用簡單字串屬性的基本 JSX 片段如 `<Username name="Sebastien"/>` 可正常運作；但使用物件/陣列屬性的複雜片段如 `<User person={{name: "Sebastien"}}/>` 則更容易因語法不像 HTML 而失敗。

segments.source_content: #### MDX solutions {#mdx-solutions}

translations.zh-hant: #### MDX 解決方案 {#mdx-solutions}

segments.source_content: We recommend extracting the complex embedded JSX code as separate standalone components. We also added an `mdx-code-block` escape hatch syntax:

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議將複雜的嵌入式 JSX 程式碼提取為獨立的元件。我們還新增了 `mdx-code-block` 逃脫語法：

segments.source_content:
`````text
# How to deploy Docusaurus

To deploy Docusaurus, run the following command:

````mdx-code-block 

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';

import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="bash" label="Bash">

  ```bash
  GIT_USER=<GITHUB_USERNAME> yarn deploy
  ```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="windows" label="Windows">

  ```batch
  cmd /C "set "GIT_USER=<GITHUB_USERNAME>" && yarn deploy"
  ```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
````
`````

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9f0775df

segments.source_content: This will:

translations.zh-hant: 這將：

segments.source_content:
- be interpreted by Crowdin as code blocks (and not mess-up with the markup on download)
- be interpreted by Docusaurus as regular JSX (as if it was not wrapped by any code block)
- unfortunately opt-out of MDX tooling (IDE syntax highlighting, Prettier...)

translations.zh-hant:
- 被 Crowdin 視為程式碼區塊（且在下載時不會破壞標記結構）
- 被 Docusaurus 視為常規 JSX（就像沒有被任何程式碼區塊包裹一樣）
- 可惜會脫離 MDX 工具鏈（如 IDE 語法高亮、Prettier...）

segments.source_content: ### Docs versioning {#docs-versioning}

translations.zh-hant: ### 文件版本控制 {#docs-versioning}

segments.source_content: Configure translation files for the `website/versioned_docs` folder.

translations.zh-hant: 為 `website/versioned_docs` 資料夾配置翻譯檔案。

segments.source_content: When creating a new version, the source strings will generally be quite similar to the current version (`website/docs`), and you don't want to translate the new version docs again and again.

translations.zh-hant: 當建立新版本時，原始字串通常會與當前版本（`website/docs`）非常相似，而您不希望反覆翻譯新版本的文件。

segments.source_content: Crowdin provides a `Duplicate Strings` setting.

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 提供了 `Duplicate Strings` 設定選項。

segments.source_content: ![Crowdin Duplicate Strings option setting](/img/crowdin/crowdin-settings-duplicate-strings.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Crowdin 重複字串選項設定](/img/crowdin/crowdin-settings-duplicate-strings.png)

segments.source_content: We recommend using `Hide`, but the ideal setting depends on how much your versions are different.

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議使用 `Hide`，但最佳設定取決於您的版本差異程度。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Not using `Hide` leads to a much larger amount of `source strings` in quotas, and will affect the pricing.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

不使用 `Hide` 會導致配額中的 `source strings` 數量大幅增加，並影響定價。

:::

segments.source_content: It could have been helpful to be able to edit the translations in both Git and Crowdin, and have a **bi-directional sync** between the 2 systems.

translations.zh-hant: 理論上這本應有助於在 Git 和 Crowdin 上同時編輯翻譯，並實現兩個系統間的**雙向同步**。

segments.source_content: In practice, **it didn't work very reliably** for a few reasons:

translations.zh-hant: 但實際上**運作效果不太理想**，原因如下：

segments.source_content:
- The Crowdin -> Git sync works fine (with a pull request)
- The Git -> Crowdin sync is manual (you have to press a button)
- The heuristics used by Crowdin to match existing Markdown translations to existing Markdown sources are not 100% reliable, and you have to verify the result on Crowdin UI after any sync from Git
- 2 users concurrently editing on Git and Crowdin can lead to a translation loss
- It requires the `crowdin.yml` file to be at the root of the repository

translations.zh-hant:
- Crowdin -> Git 的同步功能正常（透過 pull request）
- Git -> Crowdin 的同步需手動操作（必須點擊按鈕）
- Crowdin 用於匹配現有 Markdown 翻譯與原始檔的啟發式方法並非 100% 可靠，每次從 Git 同步後都需在 Crowdin UI 上驗證結果
- 當用戶同時在 Git 和 Crowdin 上編輯時可能導致翻譯內容遺失
- 需要將 `crowdin.yml` 檔案置於儲存庫根目錄

segments.source_content: ### In-Context localization {#in-context-localization}

translations.zh-hant: ### 上下文本地化 {#in-context-localization}

segments.source_content: Crowdin has an [In-Context localization](https://support.crowdin.com/in-context-localization/) feature.

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 提供[上下文本地化](https://support.crowdin.com/in-context-localization/)功能。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Unfortunately, it does not work yet for technical reasons, but we have good hope it can be solved.

Crowdin replaces Markdown strings with technical IDs such as `crowdin:id12345`, but it does so too aggressively, including hidden strings, and messes up with front matter, admonitions, JSX...

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

遺憾的是，由於技術原因目前尚無法運作，但我們認為未來有望解決。

Crowdin 會將 Markdown 字串替換為技術性 ID（如 `crowdin:id12345`），但此過程過於激進，會影響隱藏字串、前言資料、警示框和 JSX 等內容...

:::

segments.source_content: ### Machine Translation (MT) issue: links/image handling

translations.zh-hant: ### 機器翻譯 (MT) 問題：連結/圖片處理

segments.source_content: Crowdin recently rolled out some major changes to the markdown file format and now the links are treated differently than they were before. Before they were considered as tags, but now they appear as plain text. Because of these changes the plain text links are passed to the MT engine which attempts to translate the target, thus breaking the translation (for instance: this string `Allez voir [ma merveilleuse page](/ma-merveilleuse-page)` is translated `Check out [my wonderful page](/my-wonderful-page)`, and this breaks docusaurus i18n workflow as the page name should not be translated).

translations.zh-hant: Crowdin 近期對 Markdown 檔案格式進行重大變更，連結的處理方式與以往不同。過去連結被視為標籤，但現在會以純文字形式顯示。由於這些變更，純文字連結會被傳送至 MT 引擎嘗試翻譯目標網址，導致翻譯錯誤（例如：字串 `Allez voir [ma merveilleuse page](/ma-merveilleuse-page)` 被翻譯為 `Check out [my wonderful page](/my-wonderful-page)`，這會破壞 Docusaurus 的國際化工作流程，因為頁面名稱不應被翻譯）。

segments.source_content: As of 2023 Dec.7, they are not planning to change the logic of how links are treated, so you should have this in mind if you plan to use Crowdin with MT.

translations.zh-hant: 截至 2023 年 12 月 7 日，Crowdin 並未計劃變更連結的處理邏輯，因此若您計劃搭配使用 Crowdin 與機器翻譯，請務必注意此問題。
